# VEHICLE::GET_VEHICLE_NUMBER_PLATE_TEXT_INDEX

## Summary
Gets the number plate index

## Returns
* **INT**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the PlateType of a vehicle
